verses.verse: Then he cried<WH7121> in my ears<WH241> with a loud<WH1419> voice,<WH6963> saying,<WH559> Cause those who are in charge<WH6486> of the city<WH5892> to draw near,<WH7126> every man<WH376> with his destroying<WH4892> weapon<WH3627> in his hand.<WH3027>

Behold,<WH8337> six men<WH582> came<WH935> from the way<WH1870> of the upper<WH5945> gate,<WH8179> which lies<WH6437> toward the north,<WH6828> every man<WH376> with his slaughter<WH4660> weapon<WH3627> in his hand;<WH3027> and one<WH259> man<WH376> in their midst<WH8432> clothed<WH3847> in linen,<WH906> with a writer<WH5608>'s inkhorn<WH7083> by his side.<WH4975> They went in,<WH935> and stood<WH5975> beside<WH681> the bronze<WH5178> altar.<WH4196>

The glory<WH3519> of the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478> was gone up<WH5927> from the cherub,<WH3742> whereupon it was,<WH4670> to the threshold of the house:<WH1004> and he called<WH7121> to the man<WH376> clothed<WH3847> in linen,<WH906> who had the writer<WH5608>'s inkhorn<WH7083> by his side.<WH4975>

Yahweh<WH3068> said<WH559> to him,<WH5674> Go through the midst<WH8432> of the city,<WH5892> through the midst<WH8432> of Jerusalem,<WH3389> and set<WH8427> a mark<WH8420> on the foreheads<WH4696> of the men<WH582> that sigh<WH584> and that cry<WH602> over all the abominations<WH8441> that are done<WH6213> in its midst.<WH8432>

To the others<WH428> he said<WH559> in my hearing,<WH241> Go<WH5674> through the city<WH5892> after<WH310> him,<WH5221> and strike: don't<WH5869> let your eye spare,<WH2347> neither have pity;<WH2550>

kill<WH2026> utterly<WH4889> the old<WH2205> man,<WH970> the young man and the virgin,<WH1330> and little children<WH2945> and women;<WH802> but don't<WH5066> come near any man<WH376> on whom is the mark:<WH8420> and begin<WH2490> at my sanctuary.<WH4720> Then they began<WH2490> at the old<WH2205> men<WH582> that were before<WH6440> the house.<WH1004>

He said<WH559> to them,<WH2930> Defile the house,<WH1004> and fill<WH4390> the courts<WH2691> with the slain.<WH2491> Go forth!<WH3318> They went forth,<WH3318> and struck<WH5221> in the city.<WH5892>

It happened,<WH5221> while they were smiting, and I was left,<WH7604> that I fell<WH5307> on my face,<WH6440> and cried,<WH2199> and said,<WH559> Ah<WH162> Lord<WH136> Yahweh!<WH136> will you destroy<WH7843> all the residue<WH7611> of Israel<WH3478> in your pouring out<WH8210> of your wrath<WH2534> on Jerusalem?<WH3389>

Then he said<WH559> to me,<WH5771> The iniquity of the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> and Judah<WH3063> is exceedingly<WH3966> great,<WH1419> and the land<WH776> is full<WH4390> of blood,<WH1818> and the city<WH5892> full<WH4390> of perversion:<WH4297> for they say,<WH559> Yahweh<WH3068> has forsaken<WH5800> the land,<WH776> and Yahweh<WH3068> doesn't<WH7200> see.
As for me also,<WH5869> my eye shall not spare,<WH2347> neither will I have pity,<WH2550> but I will bring<WH5414> their way<WH1870> on their head.<WH7218>

Behold,<WH376> the man clothed<WH3847> in linen,<WH906> who had the inkhorn<WH7083> by his side,<WH4975> reported<WH7725> the matter,<WH1697> saying,<WH559> I have done<WH6213> as you have commanded me.<WH6680>
